body_html:
I've finished testing and am satisfied that the change as described above, applied globally, yields correct code. I won't be able to submit a patch for a little while due to other priorities, but if anyone is interested, the following script makes the necessary changes when run from the repository's root directory.

#!/bin/bash

for f in $(find ./tensorflow/ -type f)
do
  perl -pi -e 's/\.tensor</\.template tensor</g' "${f}"
  perl -pi -e 's/->tensor</->template tensor</g' "${f}"
  perl -pi -e 's/\.shaped</\.template shaped</g' "${f}"
done

body:
I've finished testing and am satisfied that the change as described above, applied globally, yields correct code. I won't be able to submit a patch for a little while due to other priorities, but if anyone is interested, the following script makes the necessary changes when run from the repository's root directory.
```bash
#!/bin/bash

for f in $(find ./tensorflow/ -type f)
do
  perl -pi -e 's/\.tensor</\.template tensor</g' "${f}"
  perl -pi -e 's/->tensor</->template tensor</g' "${f}"
  perl -pi -e 's/\.shaped</\.template shaped</g' "${f}"
done
```
